• Contact

We share passion for Aviation.

Redhill Aero Club is a place for pilots, students and enthusiasts to share a mutual interest in aviation through organised fly-outs, social evenings with guest speakers, summer barbecues and regular social events. It’s what flying is all about.

Fly with us

Be the pilot for the day!

Ever dreamt of flying a small aeroplane? Make your dream a reality with this unforgettable experience for one. Get an incredible insight into what it’s like to operate a light aircraft Your instructor will give you through as a private pilot. With an instructor guiding you through it all, you’ll be totally immersed in every step of the experience, from deciding a route, inspecting and preparing the aircraft for flight, and then taking to the skies!

Let's talk

Do you want to learn to fly?

Cubair Flight Training is part of Redhill Aero Club. Cubair is a long established flying school specialising in flying training for the Private Pilots Licence, associated ratings and tailwheel training.

Learn to fly with Cubair

Stay up to date with our latest events and announcements

Follow us on social media for exciting stories and photos from our events. On our social media we post exciting stories about our flights and events. Don't miss out!

Live 24/7 from Hangar 8

See what is happening at Redhill Aerodrome and our home, hangar 8. It’s great for a live weather check, or seeing if your aircraft is back at parking. You might even catch some take off and landings!

Redhill Aerodrome weather Information Check the Met Office weather map!

Let's get in touch!

If you are interested in joining or just finding out more, please email us. And you can visit us at Redhill Aerodrome too

REDHILL AERO CLUB

We are a not for profit organisation created to promote leisure aviation and aerial sport. Membership is open to all whether you are a qualified pilot, learning to fly, an aircraft owner or simply have an interest in aviation and want to enjoy the club experience.
